00011 #ifndef FORWARD_HPP
00012 #define FORWARD_HPP
00013 
00014 #include "ifthenelse.hpp"
00015 #include "typet.hpp"
00016 #include "typeop.hpp"
00017 
00018 namespace cupp {
00019 namespace kernel_magic {
00020 
00021 // ForwardParamT<T>::Type is
00022 // - constant reference for class types
00023 // - plain type for almost all other types
00024 // - a dummy type (Unused) for type void
00025 template<typename T>
00026 class ForwardParamT {
00027   public:
00028     typedef typename IfThenElse<TypeT<T>::IsClassT, 
00029                                 typename TypeOp<T>::RefConstT, 
00030                                 typename TypeOp<T>::ArgT
00031                                >::ResultT
00032             Type;
00033 };
00034 
00035 template<>
00036 class ForwardParamT<void> {
00037   private:
00038     class Unused {};
00039   public:
00040     typedef Unused Type;
00041 };
00042 
00043 }
00044 }
00045 
00046 #endif // FORWARD_HPP
